SaferVPN bụ ọrụ VPN nke Safer Social, Ltd mepụtara. Netwọk ahụ na-echebe data onye ọrụ site na ihe ize ndụ nchebe Wi-Fi site na nzuzo nke njikọ onye ọrụ site n'ọgwụgwụ ruo n'ọkwa.
SaferVPN wepụtara na 2013 site na ndị mmepe ngwanrọ cybersecurity, gụnyere ndị guzobere Amit Bareket na Sagi Gidali
Ụlọ ọrụ nne na nna SaferVPN malitere ịkwalite isi ego mgbe ịmepụtara na patenting usoro emepụtara iji nyere ndị mmanye iwu aka n'ịchọpụta na ijide ndị ohi ụgbọ ala
N'asọmpi Microsoft Imagine Cup, ndị rụpụtara ngwa mbụ Amit Bareket na Sagi Gidali gbakọtara ọnụ mere ọkwa nke abụọ
Akụrụngwa netwọkụ SaferVPN jere ozi dị ka ntọala nke Bareket na ụlọ ọrụ Gidali na-esote, Perimeta 81 mmepe ngwaahịa mbụ.
